name: Facebook Dark StylishThemes
description:
Facebook Dark theme, based on other themes of StylishThemes (https://userstyles.org/users/35365). It doesn't try to change anything in the layout, simply flips the colors to a nice shade of black on white, and adds a dark patterned background.

(There are some components on the website that remain as they were, because I'm too lazy to work on them)
